title: Venus Transit in the 5th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the fifth house enhances creativity, romance, and self-expression for Leo ascendants. This phase brings joy through artistic pursuits, learning, and heartfelt connections. Attraction feels playful and expressive, and confidence shines in performance or creative showcases. While pleasure and inspiration rise, discernment is needed in speculative matters. When creativity is guided by balance, this transit supports meaningful joy and authentic expression.

sections.heading: Career
points: Good for arts, media, and design

closing: This transit invites you to create and celebrate. Keep balance at the center to turn inspiration into lasting fulfillment.
